comment.body:
It does not work there, it seems Zeronet do not use indexes (do not show files in folder where is not index.html)

For example, adventure category: http://127.0.0.1:43110/14tchCH1HveUXqGfVZMZKp6VtNyYYjc2UT/adventure
I do not see links to files.

It seems you need to add index.html files and each should contain links to all files in particular directory..
